entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 p.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -17.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 5:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
